cards.name: Aero
cards.ability: On Reveal: Move the last enemy card played anywhere to this location.

cards.name: Agatha Harkness
cards.ability: Agatha starts in your hand. She plays your cards for you on even turns.

cards.name: Black Cat
cards.ability: If you end the turn with this in your hand, discard it.

cards.name: Ghost Rider
cards.ability: On Reveal: Bring back one of your discarded cards to this location.

cards.name: Mockingbird
cards.ability: Costs 1 less for each of your cards in play that didn't start in your deck.

cards.name: Sandman
cards.ability: On Reveal: Next turn, cards cost 1 more. (maximum 6)

cards.name: War Machine
cards.ability: Ongoing: Nothing can stop you from playing cards anywhere.

items.title: Symbiote Spider-Man League
items: 1st - Premium Mystery Variant, 3x Red Neon Borders, 310 Boosters
2nd - Mystery Variant, 3x Red Neon Borders, 310 Boosters
3rd - Mystery Variant, 2x Red Neon Borders, 310 Boosters
4th-5th - Mystery Variant, Red Neon Border, 310 Boosters
6th-10th - Mystery Variant, Red Neon Border, 155 Boosters

items.name: Sandman
changes: 5/6 - On Reveal: Players can only play 1 card next turn.
5/7 - On Reveal: Next turn, cards cost 1 more. (maximum 6)

items.name: Mockingbird
changes: 6/10 - Costs 1 less for each of your cards in play that didn't start in your deck.

items.name: Aero
changes: 5/9 - On Reveal: Move the last enemy card played anywhere to this location.

items.name: Black Cat
changes: 4/9 - If this is in your hand after the turn, discard it.

items.name: Ghost Rider
changes: 4/3 - On Reveal: Bring back one of your discarded cards to this location.

items.name: War Machine
changes: 4/7 - On Reveal: Until the end of next turn, nothing can stop you from playing cards anywhere.
4/7 - Ongoing: Nothing can stop you from playing cards anywhere.

items.name: Agatha Harkness
changes: 6/14 - Agatha starts in your hand and plays your cards for you.
6/14 - Agatha starts in your hand. She plays your cards for you on even turns.
